content: After the last Mathlib Maintainers meeting, it was resolved that Batteries will add new maintainers. Please welcome Matthew Ballard and Fran√ßois G. Dorais as maintainers who will work with current maintainers (myself and Kim Morrison). We all look forward to working with Batteries users to revive the library as a useful tool for programmers and computer scientists using Lean.
Yay!! nice to have new maintainers. Look forward to sending more PRs your way ;)
9 messages were moved from this topic to #batteries > Batteries and LEM by Kyle Miller.
